dict.string:
Disables volume up buttons (on both the device & wired headset).
*Useful if you have broken volume buttons which trigger inadvertently.
⚠️ NOTE: All "volume up" adjustments must me made via control center or "Settings -> Sounds" when using this patch. I suggest making a volume menu via Activator (with frequently used volume levels i.e. 50%, 75% etc. maybe triggered by a shake or connected to headset etc).
[v.1] Tested with an iPad mini 4 on 10.2. (6-26-17)
☞PayPal: goin730@gmail.com
